topic.title: tor everywhere broken??
topic.body:
This is "thecollector" was active in here but had to remove all my 0net data and start fresh after i enabled tor everywhere... after clicking to enable it and then restart my client, 0net REFUSED to load... after deleting all my data to start fresh i was like fuck it ill try again. this time it took and i could still access 0net but it would not load any trackers to use ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Im not a coder and im really trying to figure all this out to support the 0net!!

My question now is.. by simply running all instances through the tor browser is this really all is needed? cuz for the life of me i cant get the tor section on hello page to say anything other than "error"
